meanings.definition: The amount that a drawer can hold.
meanings.sent1: She had to organize the drawerfuls of clothes to make space for more.
meanings.sent2: I found drawerfuls of old letters when cleaning out the desk.
meanings.sent3: The drawerfuls of socks seemed to multiply overnight!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spilled out of her like drawerfuls of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The drawerfuls of memories brought a smile to her face.

meanings.definition: A large quantity of items stored in a drawer.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen drawer was filled with drawerfuls of utensils.
meanings.sent2: He collected drawerfuls of stamps from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The drawerfuls of snacks were a tempting sight for the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her heart overflowed with drawerfuls of love for her family.
meanings.sent5: The drawerfuls of art supplies inspired her creativity.
